title: AGNFAB
author: AGNFAB
content: Hi.I am selling two canvas painting that I have created: "GEORGIE" ACRYLIC ON CANVAS 460X380MM & "REVOLUCIO" ACRYLIC ON CANVAS 460X380MM. /SID 2023 (Sidarta.in)Medium used: pencils, acrylic color (winsor & newton) and uni posca pens. You can by both or just one of them. Each piece is sold separately for BTC0,021 or both paintings for BTC0,030. A certificate of authenticity is included in both paintings and shipping worldwide with EMS express is of course also included in the deal. EMS is to me a safe way, it usually takes maximum 5 business day from where I am located to for example USA. (I ship from Sweden). I have sold my work here in the past and always had a great experience. Â I drop some pictures of the actual paintings through an imgur link. I am active on twitter @ S1DARTA0 and more info about other paintings can be found on www.sidarta.inHave a blessed day./SIDhttps://imgur.com/a/dj02kXw
